docs.title: Python
docs.text:
• Python Programming Language
  • What is Django?

docs.title: What is Django?
docs.text: Django is a high-level Python web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design. It follows the "batteries-included" philosophy, providing built-in features for handling common web development tasks. Django is widely used for building scalable, secure, and maintainable web applications.

docs.title: Fast Development
docs.text: • Provides built-in tools and modules that speed up web development.

docs.title: Secure by Default
docs.text: • Protects against security threats like SQL injection, cross-site scripting (XSS), and cross-site request forgery (CSRF).

docs.title: Scalability
docs.text: • Designed to handle high traffic loads efficiently, making it suitable for large-scale applications.

docs.title: MVT Architecture
docs.text: • Uses the Model-View-Template (MVT) pattern to separate concerns and enhance code maintainability.

docs.title: ORM (Object-Relational Mapper)
docs.text: • Provides an intuitive ORM to interact with databases without writing raw SQL queries.

docs.title: Built-in Admin Panel
docs.text: • Comes with an auto-generated admin interface for managing application data.

docs.title: Reusable and Modular Components
docs.text: • Encourages code reusability with Django apps, which can be plugged into multiple projects.

docs.title: Middleware Support
docs.text: • Includes middleware for processing requests and responses efficiently.

docs.title: REST Framework Support
docs.text: • Easily integrates with Django REST Framework (DRF) to build RESTful APIs.

docs.title: Internationalization & Localization
docs.text: • Supports multiple languages and time zones for global applications.

docs.title: Caching & Performance Optimization
docs.text: • Provides built-in caching mechanisms to enhance application speed and efficiency.

docs.title: Robust Community & Documentation
docs.text:
• Has a large, active community and comprehensive documentation for easy learning and troubleshooting.

Django’s powerful features and scalability make it a top choice for developers building modern web applications.

docs.title: What is JavaScript?
docs.text: JavaScript is a lightweight, interpreted programming language primarily used for building interactive and dynamic web applications. It is a key technology of the web, alongside HTML and CSS, enabling client-side scripting to enhance user experiences. JavaScript is widely used in front-end and back-end development, game development, and mobile applications.

docs.title: Lightweight & Interpreted
docs.text: • JavaScript is executed directly by the browser without requiring compilation.

docs.title: Dynamic Typing
docs.text: • Variables can hold different types of data without explicit type declarations.

docs.title: Event-Driven & Asynchronous Programming
docs.text: • Supports event-driven programming with asynchronous capabilities using callbacks, promises, and async/await.

docs.title: Cross-Platform Compatibility
docs.text: • Runs on various platforms, including web browsers, servers (Node.js), and mobile devices.

docs.title: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
docs.text: • Supports object-oriented concepts like prototyping, inheritance, and encapsulation.

docs.title: Functional Programming Support
docs.text: • Allows functional programming paradigms, enabling higher-order functions and immutability.

docs.title: DOM Manipulation
docs.text: • Interacts with and modifies the Document Object Model (DOM) to create dynamic web pages.

docs.title: High Performance
docs.text: • JavaScript engines like V8 (Chrome) and SpiderMonkey (Firefox) optimize execution speed.

docs.title: Rich Ecosystem & Libraries
docs.text: • Offers numerous frameworks and libraries like React, Angular, Vue.js, and Node.js for rapid development.

docs.title: Strong Community & Support
docs.text: • Has a vast developer community, extensive documentation, and frequent updates.

docs.title: Integration with Other Technologies
docs.text: • Works seamlessly with HTML, CSS, and APIs to build full-stack applications.

docs.title: Security Features
docs.text: • Supports security mechanisms like CORS, Content Security Policy (CSP), and HTTPS to prevent vulnerabilities.

docs.title: Server-Side Development with Node.js
docs.text:
• JavaScript can be used for back-end development using Node.js, enabling full-stack JavaScript applications.

JavaScript's versatility, speed, and extensive ecosystem make it a fundamental language for modern web and software development.

docs.title: Python Programming Language
docs.text: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its simplicity, readability, and versatility. It is widely used in web development, data science, artificial intelligence, automation, and more. Python emphasizes code readability with its clean syntax and indentation-based structure.

docs.title: Easy to Learn & Use
docs.text: • Python has a simple and readable syntax, making it beginner-friendly.

docs.title: Interpreted Language
docs.text: • Python executes code line by line, making debugging easier.

docs.title: Dynamically Typed
docs.text: • No need to declare variable types explicitly; Python determines the type at runtime.

docs.title: High-Level Language
docs.text: • Python abstracts complex memory management and system details, allowing developers to focus on logic.

docs.title: Object-Oriented & Functional
docs.text: • Supports multiple programming paradigms, including OOP and functional programming.

docs.title: Extensive Standard Library
docs.text: • Comes with a rich set of built-in modules and libraries for tasks like file handling, networking, and mathematics.

docs.title: Platform Independent
docs.text: • Python code runs on multiple platforms (Windows, macOS, Linux) without modification.

docs.title: Huge Community Support
docs.text: • A large global community provides resources, frameworks, and support.

docs.title: Automation & Scripting
docs.text: • Used for writing automation scripts to handle repetitive tasks.

docs.title: Integration Capabilities
docs.text:
• Can integrate with C, C++, Java, and other languages.

Python's versatility and ease of use make it a preferred language for beginners and professionals alike.

docs.title: Python Simple Class Example
docs.text:
example.py
class Person:
    def __init__(self, name, age):
        self.name = name
        self.age = age

    def greet(self):
        return f"Hello, my name is {self.name} and I am {self.age} years old."

# Create an object of the class
person1 = Person("Alice", 25)

# Call the method
print(person1.greet())
